page.title: 19Mickleton School on Skomer
page.content: On the second full day of our week at Broad Haven we went to{Skomer}. The only inhabited house on the island was occupied by our guide Rosanne.She took us to the derelict farmhouse.Near this she fetched a{manx shearwater}from its burrow.We saw all the old farm machinery like the plough,the tractor and a horse-powered drive for farm machines in the barn.There are holiday rooms that are let to holiday makers in the Summer.We went on a Nature Trail round the island and saw the birds on our spotter list.We went through a nesting colony of{lesser {black-backed gulls}with some{herring {gulls.}We watched{kittiwakes,razor- {bills,guillemots}on a steep cliff face and{puffins}by their burrows.On a sunny rock by the sea a{grey seal}was basking in the sun.{Thrift,bluebells, {sea campion}were flowering everywhere.
